revised_title: Acoustic Scattering by Rigid Barriers in Fluid-Loaded Parallel Elastic Plates
tldr: The article investigates the acoustic scattering of sound waves by a rigid barrier between two fluid-loaded parallel elastic plates. The Wiener-Hopf technique is applied to obtain a set of linear simultaneous equations, which can be inverted numerically to calculate the sound scattered by the barrier. An approximate analytic solution is obtained in the low-frequency limit and compared with a numerical example.
